column4: Anyone got time to help me get TV out on my ATI x600 card to work?
Anyone got time to help me get TV out on my ATI x600 card to work?
have you installed catalyst control center?
I've tried that but that just fucked up my xorg.conf file and I had to restore the old one
how do I access ccc from the terminal then?
I run "aticonfig --initial" and got this: "Data incomplete in file /etc/X11/xorg.conf Device section "Configured Video Device" must have a Driver line.
I got this question while running "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg": "Use kernel frambuffer device interface? Yes, no?"
Btw, how do I find out what PCI BusID is the right one?
